content: Great Article Maxime!! From companies big and small, I’ve seen the role require everything from containerization and hdfs to dashboards and machine learning. Would love to have more of a consensus on “data engineering.” I’m curious to your thoughts on the various roles and sub-teams among a data organization — how Airbnb has evolved the data organization to where it is today? Any advice on how to structure data engineering teams? +1 to the “Some Best Practices with Airflow” article!
